Address: 601 UNION STREET SUITE 2000, SEATTLE, Washington, 98101, United States of America
CompanyDescription: HomeStreet, Inc. (together with its consolidated subsidiaries, "HomeStreet," the "Company," "we," "our" or "us"), a Washington corporation, is a diversified financial services company founded in 1921, headquartered in Seattle, Washington, serving customers primarily on the West Coast of the United States, including Hawaii. We are principally engaged in commercial banking, consumer banking, and real estate lending, including commercial real estate and single family mortgage lending. In addition to the banking and lending operations of our wholly owned subsidiaries, HomeStreet also sells insurance products and services for consumer clients under the name HomeStreet Insurance. Our primary subsidiaries are HomeStreet Bank and HomeStreet Capital Corporation. HomeStreet Bank is a Washington state-chartered commercial bank providing commercial and consumer loans including mortgage loans, deposit products, private banking and cash management services.  ...
